4. After counting, I find that there are indeed 7 instances where the US won since 1990: 2009, 2002, 1998, 1996, 1994, 1992, and 1990.
5. Finally, I compare my findings to the claim: "the US last win the solheim cup in 2009, which be 1 of 7 title since 1990". The claim is true because both conditions are met: the US last won in 2009 and there have been 7 wins since 1990.
